sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Create a Catalog Task then add all of the Catalog Item variables to it.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Creates a Catalog Task then adds all Catalog Item variables so they are shown on task. Useful to call from Flows and Subflows that are used for more than one Catalog Item and/or Catalog Builder items that don't exist yet.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Create Catalog Task, Add Variables

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.annotation: Create a Catalog Task then add all of the Catalog Item variables to it.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description: Creates a Catalog Task then adds all Catalog Item variables so they are shown on task. Useful to call from Flows and Subflows that are used for more than one Catalog Item and/or Catalog Builder items that don't exist yet.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.name: Create Catalog Task, Add Variables
